DataSet.description:
Standard initial state for LDYN vehicles.
vehicle stopped
"ignition on" (workaround for CPC initialization, drv_ign initial off switch on after short delay) ECUs booted and running - CPC/PPC: is starting (some outputs can be SNA in the first step)
active service brake (Betriebsbremse), no park brake (Festellbremse) air pressure system (filled): 12.5 bar in circuit 1 and 2 Accelerator pedal = 0 and brake pedal = 0,6 / 60%
engine running, started in operating temperature initial engine speed: 800rpm
no gear request transmission is in neutral gear clutch open
ambient air const: pressure 1013mbar, temperature 20 degC, humidity 60%
DataSet.name: ldStd
